0.1.name: wordpress/twitter-badge
0.1.description:
Generate a Twitter Badge for your site based on twitterBadge

Features:

  • No image or flash for text
  • No JavaScript needed
  • Link directly to you twitter account!
  • You can select background color, text color and your own text

Works in Works in FF 3.5, Chromium (No Autoscroll), ie7,ie8, NO IE6.

Other plugin WP-PageScroll
